Reviews.Title: “excellent business trip”
Reviews.Author: Jiacheng N
Reviews.Content: My Iraqi partner booked this hotel for me. It is real good hotel, nice, clean and high standard. Service is good too, but sleep was not good by the noise from my room next door around 2 am.

Reviews.Title: “Good for business trips”
Reviews.Author: tarunmanchanda
Reviews.Content: I satyed for a week at this hotel, Room was good and Clean. Nice health club including steam/sauna/Jacuzzi with a friendly staff and rooftop pool with views along the Creek and skyline. Free wifi in the public lounge. Staff all very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Awful”
Reviews.Author: IbrahimovicIbra
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel online. We arrived dog tired at 5 am. It took the receptionist a couple of minutes to even look at me, he then denied they received the booking. I showed him the confirmation and he never accepted it, and instead offered a suite for an extra 75 derhams until the afternoon. We accepted, and while he was getting copies of our id's, a girl walked to the information desk, and he gave us the keys real quick and asked us in a very rude hand motion to go to what supposed to be a suite. When we walked into what we thoght a suite, it turned out to be the same exact room we booked!! We didn't want to go downstairs again as we were really tired. In the afternoon when we were going to check out, we asked to speak with the manager. After waiting for him for about 15 mins, he said that they actually received our booking, and apologised for the behaviour of the receptionist and said he had no right to be deceptive. He offered we stay there for another night, but one was more than enough. I said your apology is useless as long as you did not do anything about anything.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect central business hotel”
Reviews.Author: 27kwai
Reviews.Content: Clean, high standard central hotel. Health club including rooftop pool with views along the Creek, QE2 in the distance and with the high-rise along the Sheikh Zayeed Road on the western skyline. Free wifi in the public lounge. Staff all very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant experience”
Reviews.Author: globalphoto
Reviews.Content: Was located here due BA cancelled all flights to Heathrow and re-booked on Emirates. Also Emirates returned after 3 hour flight and booked us in this hotel (I had business class). The service and efficiency was top. The staff (and specially sales manager) were very helpful to assist about info from Emirates. There's small swimming pool and longchairs at the rooftop with magnificent view on Dubai Creek and Cruise terminals. Only 15 minutes drive from airport.

Reviews.Title: “Great service”
Reviews.Author: Amir-traveller
Reviews.Content: The hotel is new. Rooms are not that big but are equipped with almost all you need. The service is excellent. If you have any problem or need they do their best to satisfy you. When you arrive to the hotel for the first time, they welcome you with a glass of orange juice and a towel to dry sweat. Free internet is only available in lobby which is good for dubai. It's about 7 mins walk to metro station and however it is located in the business district you can get to main malls, beaches and attracions in about 30 mins by taxi (not in the peak hour of traffic), metro, bus or shuttles. The nearest famous shopping mall is the deira city center which you can go there by the hotel shuttle or walk (about 20 mins walk). And if you want to have a guest in your room don't worry about additional costs (which some hotels in dubaicharge for it). In this hotel they welcome your guests without need to pay any additional costs for her/him. This is a dry hotel and doesn't have a night club but if your are looking for one you can go to near hotels like hilton or moscow wich is a couple minutes by walk.

Reviews.Title: “short stay”
Reviews.Author: ArsenS
Reviews.Content: hotel rooms are small. but it is very good service and setup for its price. it is centrally located and staff is very friendly (sometimes too friendly) and nice. the breakfast is very good one. free internet is only on the grownd floor. would be nice to have it in the rooms too (free of charge!). you can pay for wireless internet in the rooms, but it is not worth the cost if you are staying for one or 2 dasy. nice bar, close to airport, close to metro, air conditioned.

Reviews.Title: “Overrated and overpriced”
Reviews.Author: Rutilante
Reviews.Content: I choose this hotel trying to close our vacation in a nice place. The smallest rooms we´ve found in our trip, our room was skipped for service twice, only warm water, too many trainees at the restaurant. Only one of the concierges drove the extra mile and helped us with some luggage we sent from Kuwait and delayed at customs. They don´t sell alcohol, to have a beer you have to go the Hilton next door and pay like a bottle of champagne. Far from most of the atractions, maybe good fr business.

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean hotel, close to mall”
Reviews.Author: giraffez
Reviews.Content: Hotel was nice an clean. Close to the Deira shopping centre though not walkable (major traffic intersection you have to cross and about 1-2km away). Taxi is plenty and reasonably cheap. Dubai mall is around 15 minutes away by car. Room is clean, bed is comfy. Hotel has wifi internet in the lobby. Connection is rather slow but better than nothing. Wide selection of food at breakfast, don't forget to try the hommus and the mayonaise/cheese spread - its yummy. Everything is beef as its a muslim country, they even have bacon made out of beef. Swimming pool at the top - it is heated but outside pool. You can go to the top level at night and see some night view of Dubai. There is a bank close by for money exchange. Bring your own hairdryer, the hairdryer is very very weak, almost quicker leaving your hair to dry naturally! Hotel is 5 star (they have a plate with 5 stars outside the entrance).

Reviews.Title: “Samaya is the place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Txkytraveler
Reviews.Content: I had never been overseas and Samaya staff made it so enjoyable and comforting. We stayed for 8 days and the staff got to know us and interacted with us in an appropriate manner. The cleanliness of the rooms, restaurants, and lobby was 5 star!! The breakfast buffett staff got to know us and brought our daughter her hot chocolate every morning. There is a shuttle to the mall and beach daily. You get delivered a paper each morning. The only concern we had was the shower leaked a small amount. The view from the room and the rooftop are relaxing. If you are wondering where to stay, this is the place, you won't be disappointed. Internet is free in the lobby, not the rooms. The lobby is comfortable. Also, we were there for Christmas and it was like we were at home!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed the Stay”
Reviews.Author: indisuresh
Reviews.Content: It is situated at a 10-15 minutes drive from the International Airport just on the Dubai Creek. It is infact closrer to the Airport then the actual drive it takes (This is can say as the Aircraft landing is clearly visible from the Roof Top). It is few blocks away from the Deira City Centre, one of the many mall in Dubai. Samaya's rates are similar to the any other Business Hotels in the Vicinty. The features are... It has a Health Club on the Top Floor (i think 17th Floor) and a small Swimming Pool on the Roof Top. The rooms are clean and nicely designed. The choice of amenities is smart and intelligent. The Restaurant serves a well layed out Continental Breakfast with a local touch (they serve Fresh Dates in the Breakfast) Another notable feature is the Shuttle bus service run by the Hotel to the nearest mall the Deira City Centre during the mornings and Evenings. To sum it up, I would say it is an ideal hotel for the ones who are Travelling on Business, like me. Do negotiate for the rate, as they charge for early Check-In (AED 200) and Late Check out.

Reviews.Title: “5 Star hotel, 6 Star service, 7 Star staff”
Reviews.Author: wesz
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel, great service, and outstanding staff. I enjoyed each minute of my stay in the hotel. As mentioned by others, the standard rooms are not big, however very comfortable, the bathrooms are equipped with everything you would need, from toothbrush, hair conditioner, even with shoe polisher. The beds are very comfortable, the rooms are cleaned daily, or as you request. The only concern is the WIFI, which is free in the lobby, but quite expensive in the room. It's my firm believe that since Deira is the business part of Dubai, the Chamber of Commerce is just meters away, the could make even better business with a free WiFi offer for everyone. I ate in both restaurants, great breakfast, mixed arabian and continental food, excellent , lunch buffet and the Iranian restaurant in the evening puts the crone onto the culinary experience. The hotel personal is just 7 star, you can really not beat the service they offered, you are always asked if everything was ok, if they could help in anything, in the restaurants they are more than friendly, they are professionals, led by Raj Kiron, a very professional gentleman. I reccomend to try in the Iranian restaurant they special Iranian ice cream and the Iranian herb tea. They were something very special. My rating is that the hotel services are wrth of each penny you pay, except the Internet service. If I were them I would offer it for free. In this case this hotel would be 100% spotless.

Reviews.Title: “Very good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Patrol
Reviews.Content: I have been to this hotel 4 times now - first time when it was only 2 days old. Very clean and new. great bed, good service - polite people - large and clean bathroom - Iron and ironing boards in room - complimentary coffee and tea in room and quite location. Would not stay anywhere else. Free high speed wireless internet in the lobby. Internet available in room for $$$. Great breakfast buffet spread.

Reviews.Title: “very good one”
Reviews.Author: travelerNatalia
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very nice , its very new , with a good staff and service. Just make sure you need to stay in Deira... Its very beautiful receptin , and cozy cofes, the room is big and very good , clean , and nice decorated. big bathroom and has everything you need inside. I like it so much .I did not find any mistakes there... it was really great.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel...friendly staff...unforgetable stay”
Reviews.Author: memofofo
Reviews.Content: we just come back from a lovely 4 day holidays we spent at Samaya. The concierge taking our car to private parking with a welcoming smile was the first thing we experienced. The room was facinating with modern furniture, top notch LCD screen, cable TV, bed is very comfortable, view on dubai creek, the open buffet breakfast has a large variety of high qualit yfood changing each day. complimentary water, tea, coffee, and newspaper are daily provided. The gym is nice, jackozy is wonderful, roof top swimming pool is small but nice especialy for kids.

Reviews.Title: “This is the place to stay”
Reviews.Author: lcastro444
Reviews.Content: Hello everyone, I was in Dubai in April for 5 nights and searched and searched for the best value and hotel in Dubai. I was completely happy with my selection. Let me tell you everything there is to know about why i chose this hotel. The hotel is only 10 minutes from Dubai International Airport and it cost about $7 US dollars to get to the hotel. The entranceo fo the hotel is very open, clean and extremely modern.. The front desk attendants were helpful and were able to check me in at 9am. I was very pleased after an 18 hour flight from San Francisco. The room I had was on the 7th floor and it was very nice and i will post pictures. The bathroom was big and the room had amazing clloset space. I had breakfast included and it was very good. It starts at 6 am and goes to 10am, Ih had all the items you could possibly need. I loved the way you get free bottled water in the room twice a day. You must go to the rooftop pool and it was really cool to see the city. I do have to say it was windy but on those hot days it felt great. I went to the gym and it had all the latest equipment. I would recommend taking the free shuttle to the Deira Beach. Its a very nice and safe beach with lots of things to do. The shuttle also goes to the city center which is this huge shopping area. I was not bored at all and felt very safe being alone. The hotel has three Lexus cars available for private tours and they charge by the hour and I did a tour that was prices at 550 dirham for 5 hours and I gave a 50 dirham tip. this is the best way to see the entire city in a day with a driver that will stop anywhere you want.

HotelInfo.Name: Samaya Hotel Deira
HotelInfo.Address: Al Rigga | PO Box 88449, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
